Hero.career: Software Engineer, Full Stack Developer, SEO Expert
Hero.greeting: Give life to that idea you have, we will create it together!

applab.achievement1: Managed end-to-end front-end development, consistently demonstrating strong coding skills and a keen eye for UI/UX design.
applab.achievement2: Collaborated with a team of 4+ developers and designers to successfully deliver 7+ dynamic web applications, leading to improved client satisfaction.
applab.achievement3: Conducted regular meetings and consultations with clients to gather feedback, clarify requirements, and present progress updates.
applab.achievement4: Demonstrated adaptability by quickly acquiring proficiency in REACT and VUE through self-guided learning and hands-on experimentation.

rour.achievement1: Engineered a property rental application complete with integrated online payment functionality.
rour.achievement2: Mastered the use of cutting-edge web technologies, including the development of PWA applications.
rour.achievement3: Evaluated and selected optimal solutions for authentication, security, storage, analytics, and performance across the development of different web pages.
rour.achievement4: Developed multiple user stories by applying various technologies correctly.

dacomp.achievement1: Collaborated with multiple teams across different company projects.
dacomp.achievement2: Android Focus: Fixed multiple issues across the company's various mobile applications.
dacomp.achievement3: SpringBoot Backend Focus: Created new endpoints to expand the functionality of the company's multiple services.

cdc.company: Club CDC: Centro de Desarrollo de Software y Capacitación
cdc.achievement1: Worked as an administrator, managing the club's operations.

clikealoCampaigns.title: Clikealo | White-Label Campaigns
clikealoCampaigns.description: A B2B "White-Label" campaign generation engine designed for strategic partners to launch lead capture portals and code redemption in minutes. The platform stands out for its deep brand personalization (logos, colors, banners) and the ability to create dynamic forms to adapt to any campaign (e.g., redemption by serial number). The system ensures legal compliance for each partner through configurable links to their own privacy policies and T&C.
clikealoCampaigns.techStack: Vue.js (Vue 2, Vuex), Vuetify, Axios, REST API.

clikealoEcommerce.title: Clikealo | B2C/B2B E-commerce
clikealoEcommerce.description: A large-scale hybrid e-commerce (B2C/B2B) for technology distribution. The platform, built with modern architecture using Next.js 14 (App Router) and TypeScript, manages a massive catalog of leading brands (Intel, HP, ASUS) and private labels. The site features critical payment integrations (Stripe, PayPal), full support for internationalization (i18n) and a robust testing ecosystem (Jest, Testing Library) to ensure application quality.
clikealoEcommerce.techStack: Next.js 14, React 18, TypeScript, Material UI, Stripe, PayPal, Jest.

nommad.title: Nommad | SaaS Platform (PropTech)
nommad.description: "Nommad" is an all-in-one SaaS platform for the real estate sector. The system centralizes the complete lifecycle of a property (publication, negotiation, closing) in a single panel, using AI to filter and prioritize prospects. It operates under a subscription model (SaaS) with multiple plans, includes custom branding for agencies, and was built with a cutting-edge stack that includes React 19 and full support for internationalization (i18n).
nommad.techStack: Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Ant Design, i18n.
